ygData.subject: Re: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: There are situations where you skill has improved without imformaing you. I have experienced situations where I hace gone Skil blah blah (7) to Skill blah blah
ygData.messageBody:
There are situations where you skill has improved without imformaing you. I have
experienced situations where I hace gone Skil blah blah (7) to Skill blah blah
(23).
Perhaps this is happeing to you?
Then again, like trying to increase any, it is better not too worry about it.

Inos
Veeshan



David wrote:

> From: "David" <milamber@...>
>
> I have put a couple of training points in to Archery and have fired a lot of
> arrows at blue and above creatures, and haven't gained any experience and I
> have been keeping watch on it. I have fired over 200 arrows and nothing.
> Is their any reason? or just plain bad luck. I think my pets and party
> members are getting mad at me becuse they want me to tank for them but I
> really want to increase my archery skill. I have a long bow with the
> standard arrows. Plus I couldn't find the book on making arrows in .... the
> dark elf city ... Neriak(?) anyone know where it is?
>
> Thanks
>
> David
